id: ID of the test. Must be unique. Generated UUID if not specified.
file: File the test is defined in. All actions for a given test must be defined in a single file.

actions.line: The line number that the test action definition begins on.
actions.element_id: The id attribute value of the HTML element.
actions.element_type: The kind of HTML element. For example, if the HTML element is <input>, the element_type value would be 'input'.
actions.element_class: A class assigned to the HTML element.
actions.element_text: Text displayed by the HTML element
actions.element_xpath: The XPath expression for the element. If specified, the following elements are ignored: element_id, element_type, element_class, element_text.
actions.keys: Strings of keys of enter. Only for sendKeys action. ENTER is a reserved enum that triggers the Enter key.
actions.duration: How long to wait in milliseconds. Only for wait action.
actions.imageDirectory: Override for the default imagePath config. Default is config.imageDir.
actions.videoDirectory: Override for the default videoPath config. Default is config.videoDirectory.
actions.filename: Default is test.id + action object number.
